info.name: Yapauctpwlawaiharlntb Highlighter
info.description: Made a thread highlighter so I can find my clan faster.
info.additionalInfo: I suppose you could make it work for a different thread if you were inclined to by changing the number 191 to the id of the thread you want to use it on. But why would you want to do that when Yapauctpwlawaiharlntb is the best clan there?
